entry.title: about me
entry.content: {% gp 8-2 %} {% endgp %} 人是一种有这很多缺陷的生物，比如大量的记忆不能够持久，情绪会影响到行事的方式等等。 所以就需要使用工具来进行辅助，文字记录就是对记忆不持久的修补。这个博客就是对我的修补。

entry.title: Demo Sites
entry.content: If you want to exchange friendly links on this site, please leave your site information in the comment section. The format reference is as follows: 1 2 3 4 - name: Hugo-NexT desc: Hugo NexT Official Site. avatar: https://hugo-next.eu.org/imgs/hugo_next_avatar.png link: https://hugo-next.eu.org
